Description.Text: Dreamhouse Apartments Glasgow City Centre is conveniently located in the popular Glasgow City Center area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, elevator are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, telephone, television. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Dreamhouse Apartments Glasgow City Centre combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Glasgow unforgettable.
Dreamhouse Apartments Glasgow City Centre is conveniently located in the popular Glasgow City Center
